summary: MY CAR TURNED OFF COMPLETELY WHEN THE KEY FOB TURNED BY ITSELF. MY VEHICLE NARROWLY MISSED BEING REAR ENDED BY A TRACTOR TRAILER, WHOSE DRIVER  JUMPED OUT SCREAMING AT ME. I REPORTED THE PROBLEM TO THE DEALER AND HE SAID CAR HAD BEEN RECALLED FOR THAT PROBLEM, THEY DID NOT HAVE THE PART. I DROVE FROM SC TO NJ! SCARY. RECALL NUMBER IS L25/NHTSA14V-373. I ALSO REPORTED THIS TO CHRYSLER ON SEPT 25, 2014. MY CASE NUMBER IS 8R117647. MY VAN TURNED OFF A SECOND TIME. I HAVE CONTACTED CHRYSLER THREE TIMES ON THIS MATTER AND THEY HAVE NO IDEA WHEN THE PART WILL BE AVAILABLE. THEY REFUSED TO PAY FOR A RENTAL CAR SAYING THAT THE PART WOULD BE AVAILABLE ANYWHERE FROM A FEW WEEKS TO UP TO A YEAR.YOUR WEBSITE SAYS THAT THE PART IS AVAILABLE BUT MY DEALERSHIP SAID THEY DO NOT HAVE THE PART AS OF TODAY. CAN YOU PLEASE HELP? I AM SCARED TO DEATH TO BE OUT DRIVING. ANY HELP WOULD BE APPRECIATED.  *TR
